product_name: The North Face Graphic Reaxion Crew T-Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: More than just your typical T-shirt, the Graphic Reaxion crew T-shirt from The North Face features lightweight, breathable and quick-drying fabric so you can tackle tough gym sessions in comfort. Performance polyester fabric wicks moisture away from skin and dries quickly, keeping skin cool and comfortable. The North Face Graphic Reaxion crew T-shirt features a relaxed fit. Closeout.
short_description: More than just your typical T-shirt, the Graphic Reaxion crew T-shirt from The North Face features lightweight, breathable and quick-drying fabric so you can tackle tough gym sessions in comfort.
